SELECT to_char(TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS TIME,TABLENAME,CONTENT,UPDATETIME FROM( SELECT TIME,TABLENAME,CONTENT, UPDATETIME,NUM FROM( SELECT T1.TIME AS TIME,T1.TABLENAME AS TABLENAME,T1.CONTENT AS CONTENT, to_char(T1.UPDATETIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPDATETIME, ROWNUM NUM FROM MONITOR_DB_INFO T1 WHERE T1.TABLENAME LIKE '%${tablename}%' AND T1.CONTENT LIKE '%${content}%'
AND T1.TIME>=TO_DATE('${beginDate}','YYYY-MM-DD')
AND T1.TIME<=TO_DATE('${endDate}','YYYY-MM-DD')
ORDER BY UPDATETIME DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM<= ${endRow}) WHERE NUM >= ${beginRow}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT T1.TIME,T1.TABLENAME,T1.CONTENT,T1.UPDATETIME FROM MONITOR_DB_INFO T1 WHERE T1.TABLENAME LIKE '%${tablename}%' AND T1.CONTENT LIKE '%${content}%'
AND T1.TIME>=TO_DATE('${beginDate}','YYYY-MM-DD')
AND T1.TIME<=TO_DATE('${endDate}','YYYY-MM-DD')
)
